headline: As Warren Buffett Waves Goodbye – 5 Dividend Stocks That Never Leave Berkshire Hathaway
summary: If any investor has stood the test of time, it’s Warren Buffett, and with good reason. For years, the “Oracle of Omaha” has had a rock star-like presence in the investing world, and his annual Berkshire Hathaway shareholders meeting draws thousands of loyal fans who are investors. They were stunned at this year’s meeting when ... As Warren Buffett Waves Goodbye – 5 Dividend Stocks That Never Leave Berkshire Hathaway

headline: Warren Buffett's cash fortress Berkshire closes gap with S&P 500 as AI worries depress Wall Street
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's B shares and A shares moved 4.5% higher this week after a strong earnings report last weekend.
